_comment: Smart Timelapse Editor Configuration - Devon Crawford Style
_description: Adjust these settings to customize your timelapse output
_target_duration_note: Target output duration in seconds (60-90 recommended for social media)
_min_clip_note: Minimum clip length - shorter = more energetic cuts
_max_clip_note: Maximum clip length - longer clips for important moments
_motion_threshold_note: Motion sensitivity 0-1 (lower = more sensitive, catches subtle typing)
_scene_change_note: How different frames need to be to count as scene change
_activity_percentile_note: Only keep the top X% most active moments (higher = more selective)
_analysis_fps_note: Frames per second to analyze (lower = faster processing)
_output_resolution_note: Set to [1920, 1080] for 1080p, [1080, 1920] for vertical, null for original
_speed_variation_note: Randomly vary playback speed for dynamic effect
_speed_range_note: Min and max speed multipliers when speed_variation is true
_keep_audio_note: Usually false for timelapses - add music in post
